ygData.subject: Re: Spell Search
ygData.msgSnippet: Restless Bones and Banshee Aura are available in the SK guild in Grobb (Troll city) or in Oggok.  Feign Death is available in Neriak (not exactly sure where,
ygData.messageBody:
Restless Bones and Banshee Aura are available in the SK guild in
Grobb (Troll city) or in Oggok. Feign Death is available in Neriak (not
exactly sure where, but I think maybe the Enchanter's guild). Hungry Earth
and Umbral Messanger are two of the spells that you have to create I believe
since nobody seems to have found them. Start saving up those practice
points for Research and Languages.

Malark, Karana

> -----Original Message-----
> From: Dave Ellis [mailto:everquest@...]
> Sent: Friday, April 30, 1999 11:29 AM
> To: EQ_Necromancer@onelist.com
> Subject: [EQ_Necromancer] Spell Search
>
>
> From: "Dave Ellis" <everquest@...>
>
> Greetings All.
> I am Shaopaul from the land of Innoruuk. Having recently
> acquired the the
> 16th rank, I am experiencing some difficulty in finding the
> spells required
> for my trade. I am a gnome necromancer who was born and
> raised in Akanon. I
> have just returned from travels to Qeynos to purchase all of
> the level 16
> spells. The guild had:
> Cure Disease
> Cancel Magic
> Shielding
> Heart Flutter
> Shieldskin
> Spirit Armour
>
> Regretfully, the guild does not have
> Resltess Bones!!!
> Banshee Aura
> Feign Death
> Hungry Earth.
>
> If anyone knows where these spells can be found, please let
> me know. I have
> searched all of Akanon and am losing the life that once drove
> me. My undying
> gratitude to any who answer the call.
>
> Shaopaul
>
>
>
